name: WebGL2RenderingContext.drawArraysInstanced
description: The WebGL2RenderingContext.drawArraysInstanced() method of the WebGL 2 API renders primitives from array data like the gl.drawArrays() method. In addition, it can execute multiple instances of the range of elements.

refs.name: WebGL 2.0
refs.description: The definition of 'drawArraysInstanced' in the 'WebGL 2.0' specification.

refs.name: OpenGL ES 3.0
refs.description: The definition of 'glDrawArraysInstanced' in the 'OpenGL ES 3.0' specification.
